updateRules.description: Defines the rules for updating algorithms and parameters.

incrementalUpdate.description: Updates algorithms and parameters incrementally based on new data or insights.

majorUpdate.description: Performs major updates on algorithms and parameters when significant improvements are identified.

safetyChecks.description: Ensures the safety of self-modification processes.

preModificationCheck.description: Checks the safety and validity of proposed modifications before they are implemented.

postModificationCheck.description: Checks the safety and validity of modifications after they are implemented.

modificationLogging.description: Logs all self-modification activities for tracking and auditing purposes.

activityLogging.description: Logs all self-modification activities in real-time.

auditLogging.description: Logs all self-modification activities in a format suitable for auditing.
